short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension finds drop shippers on Amazon by comparing the names with the name on the address.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will the highlights certain things on your Amazon order page;

1. If the buyer name matches the name on the shipping address

2. If the buyer name closely matches the name on the shipping address

3. If the buyer name doesn’t match the name on the shipping address

4. If the telephone number isn’t a UK number beginning with 020, +44, 0044, 07, 01, 08

We developed extension this to help combat dishonest dropshippers that claim INR.

Hopefully with this plugin you will be able to identify potential dropshippers and take the necessary action before you process any orders unnoticed.
